description.narrative: Office Management Costs, which contributes to Field Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support, Field/Country Office Oversight, Management And Operations Support. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Office Management Costs

sector.narrative: Country programme process (including UNDAF planning and CCA)
Management and Operations support at CO

title.narrative: Nepal United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Policy on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF Procedure on Harmonized Approach to Cash Transfers to Implementing Partners
UNICEF procedure for programme implementation partnerships
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
Nepal 2020 Annual Report on Results for Children
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: Monthly CMT is being conducted and programme implementation rate, PBA expiry, Donor reporting DCT Status and HACT implementation are monitored. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/12/2017

title.narrative: Inventory stocks turns, and physical assets counts

target.value: 2017:<1 year and two physical assets/ supplies count per year

actual.value: 2017:Met and reported to CMT, this was conducted in line with the target.

title.narrative: Availability of monitoring tool to measure assets performance (rental/ fleet of vehicles)

actual.value: 2017:The Admin unit has established an excel sheet to monitor the efficiency of the vehicles. It is also reported in CMT.

title.narrative: Timely completion bank reconciliation and monthly submission of accounts and year end Accounts closure to DFAM

baseline.value: 18 of following month, 2013 Accounts closure timeline

target.value: 2014:14 of following month, 2014 DFAM interim and year end closure deadlines met

actual.value: 2014:Bank reconciliation & Monthly Accounts submitted on 14 of following month

title.narrative: Table of Authority Revised and aligned with Segregation Of Duties (SODs) and monitored monthly.

target.value: 2014:TOA Revised by 30 April 20143. SOD violations monitored monthly and addressed with 5 days

actual.value: 2014:Completed. Appropriate risk management measures put in place and efficiently managed
2017:Indicator met, the current rate of fund utilization is 97%.

title.narrative: Micro Assessment for 39 IPs completed and 50 Sport checks conducted by 30 November 2013.

actual.value: 2014:HACT Assessment and Assurance Plan developed with program sections and zone offices for 2014. Agreement made with two Chartered Accountant firms to conduct micro assessment of 9 IPs. Out of 9 planned, 8 micro assessment completed and report shared with IPs. Trained 24 IPs on HACT/FACE and 20 UNICEF

title.narrative: Cost saving in operation management including supply chain and ICT

actual.value: 2017:This indicator was met and the office reported US$ 373,273 cost saving

title.narrative: Timely and accurate processing of all transactions (financial, human resources and supply) and year end accounts closure

target.value: 2017:Yes. All transactions are completed within the time period mentioned in the SOPs
